repos_data.description: pickleDB is an in memory key-value store using Python's orjson module for persistence.

Simple Machines Forum — SMF in short — is free and open-source community forum software, delivering professional grade features in a package that allows you to set up your own online community within minutes!
:hocho: Strictly RFC 3986 compliant URI parsing and handling library written in C99; moved from SourceForge to GitHub
